title: '{NAME}' chart values - version '{VERSION}'
description:
You can reference this schema **in your HelmRelease** by adding this at the very top:
`# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://bbc-helm-charts.storage.googleapis.com/{NAME}/{VERSION}/helmRelease.schema.json`

and **in values files** with:
`# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://bbc-helm-charts.storage.googleapis.com/{NAME}/{VERSION}/values.schema.json`
